verses.name: Jeremiah 18:15
verses.text: Because my people hath forgotten me, they have burned incense to vanity, and they have caused them to stumble in their ways from the ancient paths, to walk in paths, in a way not cast up;

verses.name: Jeremiah 18:16
verses.text: To make their land desolate, and a perpetual hissing; every one that passeth thereby shall be astonished, and wag his head.

verses.name: Jeremiah 18:17
verses.text: I will scatter them as with an east wind before the enemy; I will shew them the back, and not the face, in the day of their calamity.
